name: Cactus Town
description:
Cactus Town is a small sort game made in less than 24 hours for the Low Effort Jam 6.
Play as a small cactus completing tasks for the people of the town to help beautify it. 

  • Chop wood
  • Mine rocks
  • Pick Flowers
  • Gather herbs
  • Collect water

You can watch as you help changes the town!

Controls Keyboard 

Arrow keys -  Movement

Z - Select

X- Menu / Cancel

Mouse

Left click - move to point/select

Right click - Menu/ Cancel

Touchscreen

1 finger- move to point/select

2 finger tap - Menu/ Cancel

Credits

Game  Engine and RTP Assets - RPG Maker MV

Menu Plugin - Mjshi

Cactus Sprites - Ace Savaid
